name: Cato BioVentures
overview: Cato BioVentures is the venture capital affiliate of Cato Research Ltd., a global contract research and development organization (CRO). For over 20 years, Cato BioVentures and Cato Research have partnered with entrepeneurs, academic institutions, and a broad base of biotech and pharmaceutical companies to advance a robust portfolio of sucessful product development programs. They focus on early to mid-stage investment opportunities in private companies and undervalued public companies.
